fields.name: station_id
fields.doc: {"description": "7 character station ID, or a currents station ID."}

fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: {"description": "Timestamp of the water level measurement"}

fields.name: value
fields.doc: {"description": "Value of the water level"}

fields.name: stddev
fields.doc: {"description": "Standard deviation of 1-second samples used to compute the water level height"}

fields.name: outside_sigma_band
fields.doc: {"description": "Flag indicating if the water level is outside a 3-sigma band. Possible values: 'false' (not outside), 'true' (outside)."}

fields.name: flat_tolerance_limit
fields.doc: {"description": "Flag indicating if the flat tolerance limit is exceeded. Possible values: 'false' (not exceeded), 'true' (exceeded)."}

fields.name: rate_of_change_limit
fields.doc: {"description": "Flag indicating if the rate of change tolerance limit is exceeded. Possible values: 'false' (not exceeded), 'true' (exceeded)."}

fields.name: max_min_expected_height
fields.doc: {"description": "Flag indicating if the max/min expected water level height is exceeded. Possible values: 'false' (not exceeded), 'true' (exceeded)."}

fields.name: station_id
fields.doc: {"description": "7 character station ID, or a currents station ID."}

fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: {"description": "Timestamp of the prediction"}

fields.name: value
fields.doc: {"description": "Value of the prediction"}

fields.name: station_id
fields.doc: {"description": "7 character station ID, or a currents station ID."}

fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: {"description": "Timestamp of the air pressure measurement"}

fields.name: value
fields.doc: {"description": "Value of the air pressure"}

fields.name: max_pressure_exceeded
fields.doc: Flag indicating if the maximum expected air pressure was exceeded

fields.name: min_pressure_exceeded
fields.doc: Flag indicating if the minimum expected air pressure was exceeded

fields.name: rate_of_change_exceeded
fields.doc: Flag indicating if the rate of change tolerance limit was exceeded

fields.name: min_temp_exceeded

fields.name: rate_of_change_exceeded

fields.name: speed
fields.doc: {"description": "Wind speed"}

fields.name: direction_degrees
fields.doc: {"description": "Wind direction"}

fields.name: direction_text
fields.doc: {"description": "Direction - wind direction in text."}

fields.name: gusts
fields.doc: {"description": "Wind gust speed"}

fields.name: max_wind_speed_exceeded
fields.doc: Flag indicating if the maximum wind speed was exceeded

fields.name: rate_of_change_exceeded

fields.name: value

fields.name: value
fields.doc: {"description": "Value of the conductivity"}

fields.name: station_id
fields.doc: {"description": "7 character station ID, or a currents station ID."}

fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: {"description": "Timestamp of the salinity measurement"}

fields.name: salinity
fields.doc: {"description": "Value of the salinity"}

fields.name: grams_per_kg
fields.doc: {"description": "Grams of salt per kilogram of water"}

fields.name: tidal
fields.doc: {"description": "Indicates whether the station measures tidal data."}

fields.name: greatlakes
fields.doc: {"description": "Indicates whether the station is located in the Great Lakes region."}

fields.name: shefcode
fields.doc: {"description": "Standard Hydrologic Exchange Format code for the station."}

fields.name: state
fields.doc: {"description": "State where the station is located."}

fields.name: timezone
fields.doc: {"description": "Timezone of the station."}

fields.name: timezonecorr
fields.doc: {"description": "Timezone correction in minutes for the station."}

fields.name: observedst
fields.doc: {"description": "Indicates whether the station observes Daylight Saving Time."}

fields.name: stormsurge
fields.doc: {"description": "Indicates whether the station measures storm surge data."}

fields.name: forecast
fields.doc: {"description": "Indicates whether the station provides forecast data."}

fields.name: outlook
fields.doc: {"description": "Indicates whether the station provides outlook data."}

fields.name: HTFhistorical
fields.doc: {"description": "Indicates whether the station has historical High Tide Flooding data."}

fields.name: nonNavigational
fields.doc: {"description": "Indicates whether the station is non-navigational."}

fields.name: id
fields.doc: {"description": "Unique identifier for the station."}

fields.name: name
fields.doc: {"description": "Name of the station."}

fields.name: lat
fields.doc: {"description": "Latitude of the station."}

fields.name: lng
fields.doc: {"description": "Longitude of the station."}

fields.name: affiliations
fields.doc: {"description": "Affiliations of the station."}

fields.name: portscode
fields.doc: {"description": "PORTS code for the station."}

fields.name: self
fields.doc: {"description": "URL to the station's data."}

fields.name: expand
fields.doc: {"description": "URL to expanded information about the station."}

fields.name: tideType
fields.doc: {"description": "Type of tide measured by the station."}

fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: {"description": "Timestamp of the visibility measurement"}

fields.name: value
fields.doc: {"description": "Value of the visibility"}

fields.name: max_visibility_exceeded
fields.doc: A flag that indicates whether the maximum expected visibility was exceeded

fields.name: min_visibility_exceeded
fields.doc: A flag that indicates whether the minimum expected visibility was exceeded

fields.name: rate_of_change_exceeded
fields.doc: A flag that indicates whether the rate of change tolerance limit was exceeded
